name: Primer MyData for Woocommerce
author: Primer Software

sections.description:
Convert your e-shop orders to legal receipts and invoices directly from your wordpress website! No external ERP, fiscal machine or cash register is required!
Only for Greek e-shops
Works with woocommerse
Compatibility with other e-shops coming soon!

Needs an active MyData subscription service to work. Get MyData subscription here

  • Easy conversion of woocommerse orders to receipts/invoices
  • No MyData setup is needed – Works out of the box!
  • Free up time and cost from having to issue receipts/invoices manually
  • No external ERP/fiscal machine/Cash Register required!
  • No complicated connections with external software
  • Plugin automatically understands and issues the correct document (receipt/invoice/invoice within E.U./invoice outside E.U.

Features

  • Plugin is free (Needs MyData service to work)
  • Orders management
  • Receipts Management
  • Issue Receipts/Invoices/Invoices within E.U./Invoices outside E.U.
  • Manual conversion of orders to receipts/invoices
  • Automatic conversion of orders to receipts/invoices based on rules (when order status is “x”, issue receipt)
  • Connection to Primer MyData services
  • Automatically send receipt/invoice to email to the client using Primer Email servers
  • Checkout options (Receipt/Invoice)
  • Smtp options and Email builder – send the receipt your way!
  • Automatically export receipts/invoices to email/server
  • Connection with external software using export can be automated
  • Automatic MyData characterizations
  • Invoice/Receipt templates
  • Test environment to emulate the sending to AADE before sending to production environment
  • Easy to use interface

Translations

  • English
  • Greek
sections.faq:
Can I issue legal receipts with this plugin?

Yes, you can issue legal receipts with this plugin, because it’s using the Primer MyData services provider, whom is a licenced MyData provider from AADE. You can check the licenced providers at https://www.aade.gr/adeiodotimena-logismika-parohon-ilektronikis-timologisis

Where can I find documentation for Primer MyData plugin?

You can find the documentation at https://primer.gr/plugin/

4.1.6 – 2024-03-12

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.1.5 – 2024-02-28

  • Fixed a bug with tax percentage taken from order

4.1.4 – 2024-02-12

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.1.3 – 2024-01-19

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.1.2 – 2024-01-16

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.1.1 – 2023-12-12

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.1.0 – 2023-10-27

  • Minor Bug Fixes

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.8 – 2023-09-29

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.7 – 2023-08-02

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.6 – 2023-08-01

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.5 – 2023-07-28

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.4 – 2023-07-20

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.3 – 2023-07-17

  • Minor Bug Fixes

4.0.0 – 2023-05-16

  • New beta version

2.0.6 – 2022-11-23

  • Minor Bug Fixes

2.0.5 – 2022-11-21

  • Minor Bug Fixes
  • Added a new feature that now you can select how many invoices will be issued foreach run of automation
  • Added a new feature that now you can change only for one time your company details for foreign invoice template

2.0.4 – 2022-11-10

  • Minor Bug Fixes
  • Added a new feature that now you can select how many products you want per page on the receipt to be shown
  • Added new error messages for orders with deleted products and clients that cannot be issued

2.0.3 – 2022-11-06

  • Minus bug fixes

2.0.2 – 2022-11-04

  • Minus bug fixes
  • New search box in orders page for search by order id

2.0.1 – 2022-10-27

  • Fixed thousand-decimal separators in export-excel
  • Fixed minus sign for cancelled receipts in export-excel

2.0.0 – 2022-09-23

  • Fixed Compatability with PHP 8.0 and PHP 8.1

1.9.8 – 2022-09-23

  • Fixed issueing receipts automation bugs
  • Fixed search filters functionalities
  • Fixed Minor Bugs during issueing receipts

1.9.5 – 2022-07-07

  • New feuture for mass searching Invoices through our website with a password in License and General Settings.
  • Informative Email when during automation when there is a major error
  • Fixed Minor Bugs during issueing receipts

1.9.4 – 2022-06-21

  • Fixed Minor Bugs for automation cron
  • Added feauture to Export for showing vat amount per tax rate
  • Fixed Minor Bugs during issueing receipts

1.9.3 – 2022-05-19

  • Added product metadata in the html product name
  • Fix for rounding issue with woocommerce orders
  • Fix for plugin to be compatible with php version 8.0 and above
  • Major Performace Fixes

1.9.0 – 2022-04-12

  • Add Notes in Invoice comment section
  • Now you can export by dates and show totals in the last row
  • Major Performace Fixes

1.7.7 – 2022-03-22

  • Minor Fixes

1.7.6 – 2022-03-17

  • Your customers can now see their invoices-receipts in my account page.
  • Minor functionality fixes
  • Accept other currencies (according to woocommerce currency)
  • New Mail smtp type: Now you can use the wordpress default smtp to send emails from the plugin.
  • Big Performance upgrades in orders page
  • VAT validation in checkout: Now your customers can enter their vat number and the rest information will be autocompleted.
  • New Invoice types: Credit Invoices. Now you can cancel your invoice with a credit invoice-receipt.

1.3.3 – 2022-01-31

  • First version.

short_description: Issue legal receipts automatically directly from your wordpress using MyData provider Services.
